title: KUTS & KOLOR Luxury Unisex Salon — 5-page marketing site (frontend)

requirements.summary: Implement a 5-page marketing site with client-side routing and top-level navigation for Home, About, Services, Gallery, and Contact.
acceptanceCriteria: The site has 5 distinct pages: Home, About, Services, Gallery, Contact.
A persistent header/nav allows navigating to all 5 pages.
The active page/route is reflected in the URL and renders without full page reload.

file_operations.description: Create the app shell with client-side routing (5 routes) and a shared layout wrapper so navigation updates the URL without full reload.
Create a shared layout component that renders the persistent header/nav, page container, and footer; used by all routes.
Create the Home page route view and wire it into the router.
Create the About page route view and wire it into the router.
Create the Services page route view and wire it into the router.
Create the Gallery page route view and wire it into the router.
Create the Contact page route view and wire it into the router.
Confirm the document title and meta tags align with the 5-page marketing website branding.

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent luxury salon theme (warm neutral palette, typography, spacing, responsive layouts) across all pages; avoid default blue/purple.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share the same design system (type scale, button styles, section spacing, and card styles).
The palette is not primarily blue/purple and feels “luxury salon” appropriate.
Layouts are responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop.

file_operations.description: Create global Tailwind + theme tokens (CSS variables for shadcn-compatible colors) using warm neutrals and a premium accent (e.g., gold/bronze), plus consistent typography and section spacing utilities.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions (fonts, container defaults, and any custom color tokens if needed) to support the luxury salon design system and responsive layouts.
Enforce consistent page structure (max-width container, vertical rhythm/section spacing) across all pages through the shared layout.
Create a small reusable layout helper for consistent section spacing and headings across pages (compose with Tailwind classes; do not modify any ui library files).

requirements.summary: Build Home page hero/content highlighting salon name, tagline/value proposition, key categories (Hair/Skin/Nails) with emphasis on hair treatments & hair colour, plus clear CTAs to call and/or book on dingg.app.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page shows “KUTS & KOLOR Luxury Unisex Salon” prominently above the fold.
Home page includes service category highlights: Hair, Skin, Nails, and explicitly mentions hair treatments and hair colour expertise.
Home page contains at least one CTA that either initiates a phone call on mobile and/or links out to dingg.app.

file_operations.description: Implement above-the-fold hero featuring “KUTS & KOLOR Luxury Unisex Salon”, a polished tagline derived from the provided description, key category highlights (Hair/Skin/Nails) with explicit emphasis on Hair Treatments + Hair Colour, and CTAs (tel: and external link to dingg.app). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Card) for consistent premium UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add the required generated hero image asset and reference it from the Home page hero section.
Add the required generated service icon strip asset and use it for Home category visuals (simple, consistent visuals without introducing a new icon library).

requirements.summary: Create About page with the provided salon description (grammar/clarity edits only) and key facts: Mumbai Central/Navjivan Society location context and “Areas served: India”.
acceptanceCriteria: About page includes an “About” section with the provided description (meaning preserved).
About page clearly states Mumbai Central / Navjivan Society location context.
About page includes “Areas served: India”.

file_operations.description: Add an About section containing the provided description text (edited only for grammar/clarity while preserving meaning), plus clearly presented key facts including Mumbai Central / Navjivan Society context and “Areas served: India”. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card) for tasteful information layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement Services page with scannable, grouped sections for Hair, Skin, and Nails, emphasizing Hair Treatments and Hair Colour with tasteful UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Services are grouped into Hair / Skin / Nails.
Hair Treatments and Hair Colour appear as emphasized offerings within Hair.
Each service group has readable, scannable presentation on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Create grouped service sections (Hair/Skin/Nails) with brief descriptions in cards/lists, and add a visually emphasized subsection for Hair Treatments and Hair Colour within Hair. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card) for consistent luxury styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the service icon strip asset is used as the simple service category visual source on the Services page (e.g., cropped/positioned segments), keeping visuals consistent across the site.

requirements.summary: Build Gallery page with a responsive image grid and modal/lightbox preview using generated placeholder salon images from static assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery page shows a responsive grid that adapts column count by viewport size.
Clicking/tapping an image opens a larger preview (modal/lightbox).
Gallery images are loaded from static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (not from the backend).

file_operations.description: Implement a responsive image grid sourced from generated static assets and add click-to-preview via a modal/lightbox. Use shadcn-ui Dialog (or equivalent) for the preview UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add required generated gallery placeholder image 1 and use it in the Gallery grid.
Add required generated gallery placeholder image 2 and use it in the Gallery grid.
Add required generated gallery placeholder image 3 and use it in the Gallery grid.
Add required generated gallery placeholder image 4 and use it in the Gallery grid.

requirements.summary: Create Contact page with full address, click-to-call phone, hours, location context, and a clear external link to dingg.app.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page shows the full provided address exactly (allowing minor punctuation normalization only).
Phone number is rendered as a clickable tel: link and displayed as “091678 60528”.
Hours are displayed as “Open · Closes 9 pm” (use English formatting).
There is an external link to dingg.app labeled clearly (e.g., “Book on dingg.app”).

file_operations.description: Add contact details: the full provided address (minor punctuation normalization only), phone displayed as “091678 60528” with a tel: link, hours displayed as “Open · Closes 9 pm”, location context lines (“Navjivan Commercial Premises CHS”, “Mumbai Central”), and a clearly labeled external link to dingg.app. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Card) for clear hierarchy. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add shared header/nav and footer with consistent branding and key contact/location info across all pages, responsive on small screens.
acceptanceCriteria: Header appears on all pages and includes site name/brand and navigation links.
Footer appears on all pages and includes phone number and a short location line (Mumbai Central, Mumbai).
Layout remains usable on small screens (nav collapses or stacks appropriately).

file_operations.description: Create a branded header with site name and navigation links to all 5 routes, including active-state styling; implement responsive behavior (collapse into a menu). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Sheet/Dropdown) to implement the mobile nav pattern. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a consistent footer including phone number and a short location line (Mumbai Central, Mumbai), plus optionally a booking link to dingg.app.
Wire Header and Footer into the shared layout so they appear on every page.
Ensure all routes render within the shared layout so header/footer are persistent across navigation.

requirements.summary: Integrate required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them consistently for hero, gallery placeholders, and service visuals.
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Home uses a hero image from the generated assets.
Gallery uses generated images; no backend image serving is introduced.
Service sections include simple visuals (icons/illustrations) sourced from generated assets.

Verify this generated service icon strip is present and used for category visuals on Home/Services in a consistent style.
